snippet: Cloud-based technology companies serving business with a direct challenge to established enterprise tech companies had an unusually good year in the public markets, reports Quentin Hardy for The New York Times's Bits blog.
abstract: Cloud-based technology companies serving business with a direct challenge to established enterprise tech companies had an unusually good year in the public markets, reports Quentin Hardy for The New York Times's Bits blog.
